lines.text: [a gang member is offering John a service]
For a certain price the Iceman can provide you with... protection
Really? How much to have you provide... ice?
No! You listen! I have a party in two hours and I need a thousand cubes and a couple of blocks. Can you help me or not?

"This is a Dark Ride"]
I heard about this.
Yeah. From the carnival. A pretty fair description of life too, I think.
[Mahalia and Catherine are wearing matching red dresses]
You two look like the Linda Ronstadt "Then and Now" album cover.

[played while Dexter drive John]
Kill whitey! kill whitey!
What's the name of the song?

[Cop pulls car over. Dexter quickly turns music off, then turns to face cop at the driver's window]
Evenin', officer.

[John reaches over and turns music back on]
Kill whitey! kill whitey!

[as he is about to have a drink with his new neighbor Carly]
Cheers.
